name: AdaLAPACK
short_description:
This contains an Ada binding to LAPACK. The original code was written by Wasu Chaopanon and this branch uses the code from http://12000.org/my_notes/ada/lapack_and_blas/index.htm.

See also Ada Lapack (https://sourceforge.net/projects/ada-lapack/), where the Fortran LAPACK routines are being translated to native Ada.
